attributes.action: Make sure that Under 18s who are found to be smoking or vaping be given fines.
attributes.background: In my country smoking and drinking is an extreme problem. Smoking and vaping for under 18s is becoming a big issue in this country. By giving them a fine (or as they are under 18 there parents) parents will be stricter and it will reduce the amount of young smokers. Parents will also do more!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition if you would like to make underage smoking and vaping under the age of 18 a criminal offence with fines for offenders.
